content.html: "It's mild now" suits people who prefer - not having to spend money on improving ventilation, good masks, or sick pay. - workers continuing to work & travel while infectious. - profits, over overall population health. If you can't see damage yet, doesn't mean it was "mild".
content.value:
"It's mild now" suits people who prefer

- not having to spend money on improving ventilation, good masks, or sick pay.

- workers continuing to work & travel while infectious.

- profits, over overall population health.

If you can't see damage yet, doesn't mean it was "mild".
